amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 118-30 to prohibit the Secretary of Energy from implementing its proposed rule regarding gas stoves, or any other rule that would limit consumer access to gas stoves.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the Secretary of Energy from implementing its proposed rule regarding gas stoves, or any other rule that would limit consumer access to gas stoves.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Palmer amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 251 - 181 (Roll no. 171).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Palmer.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Palmer amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 251 - 181 (Roll no. 171).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
